chinayedi nimawata path wu aasiyanu gron fa්ri tharaga adiyara thunedi mitara 400 isawwen prasanna sampath amarasekara ran padakkamak ha lokada padakkam 2 k dina gaththeya.usa panime tharaga isawwata ek wu manjula kumara palamu adiyaredi tharagayen iwath wu athara dewani ha thewani adiyarawaladi atawani sthanayata path wiya.dewani adiyaredi mitar 2.10 k ha thewani adiyaredi mitar 2.05 k manjula wartha kaleya.prasanna sampath amarasekara ran padakkama thathpara 46.95 kin, lokada padakkam deka thathpara 47.29 kin ha thathpara 47.03ka dakshathawakin dina gaththeya.

enayin mema thinduwa magin yali pennum karanne manawa himikam saha prakashanaye nidahasa ullanghanayakarana thasthrawadaya walakwime panatha ahosi kirime awashyathawaya yi.mema nadu thinduwa shri lankawe janamadhya nidahasa nithiya magin madalime thiranathmaka sanndhisthanayak lesa salakanashri lankawe prajathanthrawadaya sandaha janamadhyawediyo sanwidhanaya eki thinduwa aapasu harawima pinisa gatha haki samapiyawarak ma ganna lesa shri lankawe saha jathyanthara siyalu prajathanthrawadi balawegayangen illa siti.me arabhaya gatha yuthu prathama piyawara wanne shri lankawe thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha ahosi kirime wyaparayakathi kirima yi.
